meanings.definition: To smile more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always tries to outsmile her friends in photos.
meanings.sent2: He managed to outsmile everyone at the party with his bright grin.
meanings.sent3: The friendly competition led to a hilarious outsmiling contest.
meanings.sent4: Her radiant smile could outsmile even the sun on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: In the end, her ability to outsmile others made her the life of the party.

meanings.sent1: During the game, she would always outsmile her opponents to show her confidence.
meanings.sent2: He could easily outsmile anyone with his genuine happiness.
meanings.sent3: The outsmiling race between the siblings brought joy and laughter to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outsmile her fears helped her overcome challenges.
meanings.sent5: His contagious smile could outsmile any gloomy mood around him.
